title: Bug 9654: Modify Parameters - Dialog details
description: Bug 9654: Modify Parameters - Dialog details have some issues. First, there is a duplicated name validation that should be performed on the first page. Second, the first and second columns should be merged.  Additionally, there are several other issues: the marking between the button and list is too large and the top button should be aligned with the dialog top. The table should have a label so it can contain a mnemonic. Multiple selection should be allowed as move up/down can be applied to more than one item. The signature preview must be a label that wraps. It would be nice if the signature preview has the background color set to the same color as a hover. Lastly, when changing a parameter name to something very long, the preview is cutoff.
OB: Duplicated name validation is not performed on the first page. The first and second columns are not merged. The marking between the button and list is too large and the top button is not aligned with the dialog top. The table does not have a label. Multiple selection is not allowed. The signature preview is not a label that wraps. The signature preview does not have the background color set to the same color as a hover. When changing a parameter name to something very long, the preview is cutoff.
EB: The duplicated name validation should be performed on the first page. The first and second columns should be merged. The marking between the button and list should be reduced so that the top button is aligned with the dialog top. The table should have a label. Multiple selection should be allowed. The signature preview should be a label that wraps. Additionally, the signature preview should have the background color set to the same color as a hover. When changing a parameter name to something very long, the preview should not be cutoff.
SR: Perform duplicated name validation on the first page. Merge the first and second columns. Reduce the marking between the button and list so that the top button is aligned with the dialog top. Add a label to the table. Allow multiple selection. Ensure the signature preview is a label that wraps and has the background color set to the same color as a hover. Fix the issue where the preview is cutoff when changing a parameter name to something very long.
